website_summaries.verdict: With a total of 16 pieces, this large set has everything you need for safe and efficient cookware.
pros: For such a large, quality made set this cookware sits at a shockingly low price point
There is a good range of sizes and a wide variety of utensils included
The soft grip handles are comfortable to hold, and the pans are not too heavy
Even burnt food wipes out without hours of soaking and scrubbing
Dishes are free of many common chemicals such as PFOA and PFAS
The entire set is dishwasher safe
cons: Doing a lot of cooking on high temperatures will damage the white enamel over time
Medium to low temperatures are suggested

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty happy with these pans I’ve been using for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with these pans I’ve been using for a little over a year but tonight when i picked up one of the pans full of boiling brine the handle popped right off and sent boiling liquid all over the kitchen, me and the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Dubach

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: In the first couple of days these pans were perfect. I made sure to hand wash only. They started to chip.... Which meant that chip was consumed by someone in my family. Ill save the world another photo but the same brown burnt pan you see is exactly what happened to mine as well. I am a low heat cooker, when I saw the other reviews I thought maybe those people cook on extreme heats. Nope! I was wrong. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Preston M. Holder

customer_reviews.title: Sadly these are very poor quality. There are small scratches on the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these are very poor quality. There are small scratches on the bottom of the pans after being used a few times, the scratches are not that big of deal, what is a big deal is that those scratches are already RUSTING! Returning them to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Curry

customer_reviews.title: Thank God and any other Divinities for Amazon's "A to Z"  guarantee!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, what did I like about the product? The offered price, the size of the set of cookware, the color, the ceramic coating. What did I not like about the product? The set was mis-matched (two different brands of cookware tossed together), it was dirty, the ceramic of several of the pieces was horribly damaged, it was missing at least two pieces supposedly included in the set, but someone had very kindly included a gold-tone pot in the burgundy set. (Was this a consolation prize for the messed up pans that were sold?? Though I must report that as abused as this cookware was - the handles were not burned!! So thank you Amazon for protecting your customers.😇
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: This is horrible!! The pots
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would!!! This is my first review on Amazon, true talk. This is horrible!! The pots, fine. But the pans, DO NOT BUY!!! The Pans stick, do not Clea well, burn on the bottom and the handles (regardless of the heat setting) and are overall CHEAP!!!!!! I have never, in my life, bought a cheaper set of pots and pans EVER!!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!!!!! (I could go on and on but my husband thinks this is sufficient and I should give at least 2 stars..because the pans were ok for a few weeks...men!)
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. The handle keeps burning regardless of how far it is placed away from the flame and how low the heat is on the burner. We purchased these after all of my cookware was destroyed in Harvey and they aren’t worth the money. One of my kids used a metal spatula one time and it completely nicked the ceramic coating everwhere. You definitely can’t make mistakes if you’re going to own these.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Safety Concern - Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The product looks beautiful. The description sounds wonderful. I heated spaghetti sauce on medium, placed it’s cover on to avoid splattering, and a few minutes later, I heard a loud “pop” looked down, all of the glass imploded into the sauce, I picked up the pot to remove from the heat and the glass shattered everywhere, including my leg, sharp glass broke the skin and I was covered in sharred glass. Amazon refunded me, I am concerned that the glass lids will hurt someone even worse. I was told that the product would be unavailable until it was checked which did not occur.
customer_reviews.author: Magdala

customer_reviews.title: TRUE TO COLOR MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: As the Queen of Pastel Pink these port are certified fresh OKAY! When I moved into a new house I KNEW I had to have pink pots so I was elated to find such a nice set at a reasonable price. The color and my arachnophobia-driven fear of lower cabinetry made me keep them in display! Such great little pots with an amazing nonstick finish! Cleaning them was a breeze! I would recommend for any pink lover!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren & Candy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had my set for just over a month but my mom has had her set for almost two years. Great pans. You just need to follow instructions and not use cooking spray nor high heat and you should be good to go. So far they still look brand new. I did burn the underside of one of my pans but with a little bar keepers friend just on the underside, it cleaned up like new. Oh and just a side note. I ordered the purple and the handles of the cooking utensils are also purple which was a nice surprise since it wasn’t pictured that way.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SET!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for over a year, and the still look just as good as the day I got them. As long as you take care of them as the instructions state (i.e. do not use on high), they WILL last. I was surprised how quickly things will cook using the lower heat settings. I have recommended this set to friends & family and will continue to do so. By far the best set of cookware I have EVER owned!
customer_reviews.author: Dara Nix

customer_reviews.title: Well packed and looked nice but scratched with the very first use
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these as I decided to switch from Teflon coated cookware to the healthier ceramic products. They were packed very well and seem sturdy and nice as I took them out of the box. Unfortunately, the sauté pan scratched up on the bottom with the very first careful use. These aren't going to last long if I want my cookware to look decent, but I guess it's another example of "you get what you pay for". At least they weren't all that expensive. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Doni

customer_reviews.title: Useless after 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 and a half months of frequent use, I'm throwing away the saute pan from this set. We followed care instructions to a T: we used no metal utensils on the pan and even hand washed the pan after each use. Within a month, there were cracks in the non-stick surface. Now, it is basically unusable because everything sticks instantly to the surface. Our cheap Ikea pans lasted longer than this. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DefendScience

customer_reviews.title: Very durable !
customer_reviews.text: I read the review about these pots and I was extremely skeptical! However when I used them and I use them EVERY DAY they’re the best damn pots I’ve ever had. So easy to use. Easy to clean. Just easy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Muvaju

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this set, but its turned out to be a disappointment. I've had them almost a month, used only the utensils that came with them, and already they are scratched up and the coating is coming off. Also, don't cook anything like spaghetti sauce in them because it will stain. I'm now looking for new pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price! Doesnt last or stand up to regular use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a picture after 4 months of owning this. I was making hash browns and this happened! It started to immediately burn the food and then the pot. There's no cleaning or fixing this! The pots can't handle heat which is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Shay Maria

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips on outside, easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the food so far comes off of them great, I purchased feb 25th just started using them the week of March 23rd and washed them twice and they’re already chipping on the entire rim of the outside of the pans. Also had the pan centered so no idea how the handle got this hot to burn because I’ve never done this with any other pan we’ve owned. Want to return for a new set that will hopefully hold up but with the current situation don’t know if that’ll happen.
customer_reviews.author: MHa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Really bad, food sticks and burns.. also when you cook black residue sticks on the side..
customer_reviews.author: maria mejia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these, especially because I got them for a great deal through amazon warehouse. At first I rated it 3 stars because one of the pans burned on the first day even though I ensured to make sure i followed the direction for cooking with the pans. Now, 3 of My pans aren’t non-stick, and 2 of them are burned on the bottom. The pots are all fine and the color is beautiful but I am disappointed that the pans burned so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Julya

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Burned my hand when I tried to lift the pot from the stove and when I took a closer look I saw that the base of the handle had turned black (it was a lilac color). The whole home started smelling like burned plastic. This is a very cheap product and isn't worth it if looking for a kitchen staple for years. It may only last like 6 months.. Now I may have to throw out this one pot since I'm terrified it's going to have chemicals that'll mix into the food.
customer_reviews.author: Samina

customer_reviews.title: Thanks *updated review*
customer_reviews.text: The pans are already destroyed. The smell of burnt rubber from the handles and the pans started to stick shortly after usage. Now these aren't my everyday use pans so I was shocked when scrambling eggs for my children turned into a mess. Sadly the return window for these pans closed. ***Update*** After contacting the company directly via email they were very nice and easy to talk to. They remedied the issue by not only sending me a new set, but they upgraded it. Thanks so much you guys. Now I can update my 1 star rating to a 4.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: ... actually my second set of these pans and we love them now
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second set of these pans and we love them now! Lesson learned... read the care instructions before use! You are suppose to let these pans cool down before washing!
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst pans I have ever used. Everything sticks to them no matter how much butter or oil you use. I have soaked them over night to try and aid with cleaning and the food still won’t come off. I have to scrape it off. I bought the purple and they are completely discolored and stained everywhere. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. I am absolutely livid. I can’t afford to buy new pans so now I am stuck with these awful ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles burn.
customer_reviews.text: These are great in the non stick category but the handles which are plastic burn. Every single one of my pan handles are burned. And it stinks when it’s getting heated. The metal part that connects the handle to the pan isn’t long or large enough to take the heat.
customer_reviews.author: G Beckstead

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware EVER. Just have to take care of them!
customer_reviews.text: So far, these are the most AMAZING pots and pans ever! Just remember: Dont cook on high Always make sure your handle is not over the eye Do NOT soak the pans in water Wash the bottom of the pans EVERY SINGLE TIME YOU GET DONE COOKING to prevent blackened buildup I use a scrubber wand to wash inside and outside immediately after cooking. They still look brand new! Nothing sticks *squeal!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pans and let them sit in the box for about a month. When I originally opened them I thought they were just "okay" for the price. Nothing extravagant but they would work. After using the pans very lightly for the past 5 months, the non-stick coating is already coming off. I always hand wash my pans and have had sets last me several years. In fact the set I had before lasted me 6 years. I'm so disappointed I spent money on these pans as I'm already looking for a replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: I’m Not Sorry
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set of pans. They deliver an even heating surface to guarantee even cooking and they wash up very easily. The color is very beautiful and has been the first set I have encountered that has been this shade of pink. So far they have been very sturdy, which is the usual downfall in pans I buy. I will update 6 months down the line to let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Granola

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I hope after all this she likes the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas. I was totally unprepared for what was inside the box. There were used pots and pans and you could actually smell the burned oil in the box. I was very embarrased. I returned that set and reordered a new set. The new set came as ordered but they were just thrown in a brown box helter skelter. Very disappointed. I hope after all this she likes the cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Burmeister

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I just used the baking sheet for the first time. One of the photos of the product says heat resistant up to 400 degrees, and the description says 450 degrees. I put the sheet in the oven at 400 degrees for not even ten minutes before I heard a weird noise, and when I checked on it, it was extremely warped! Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: had 1 year now...
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. Easy to clean. Follow directions and tips and it'll come clean easily. Careful, the enamel does chip easily. **edit** we've had this set a year now. after about 6 month food started to stick to the pans oretty badly. We have to use a ton of oil. The pots have a lot of chips and scratches (when you've got a 10 year old that stirs with metal spoons, this will happen), but still overall pretty good. They still heat evenly. Still my favorite set of pots and pans. still a great set for the price. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I received the set of turquoise colored pans a year ago. When you buy them you will regret it after 3 months. You'll love them, then hate them. It beautiful at first, then it will have burn stain all around. It will start to peeling after 2 months, then the rest will happen, the handle will loosing, the non-stick will No longer be non-stick. Give a review after you had them for 2 month just consider doing it after you have used them for 60 days straight. Remember you will love them then regret buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set does not last 2 months! Handle started melting after 2 days of use. Don’t understand why the reason for those good reviews!
customer_reviews.author: luiza

customer_reviews.title: White enamel chips off very easily. Haven't had more than a month and have ...
customer_reviews.text: White enamel chips off very easily .Haven't had more than a month and have chips all over the pans and I use non-stick utensils to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: snowynights

customer_reviews.title: No Concerns and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely worth the money. The company claims even if the coating is completely worn out, you can use it as cast iron pans, still chemical free! I used these pans with silicon utensils, and they never change color, and super easy to clean. They seem to have much higher non stick quality than the stainless steel pots and pans, as well as ligher weight for single hand handling in the kitchen. Unless cast iron pans, these don't react with acidic sauces like tomato juice so that you never have to worry about the metals in the pans slowly being dissolved during cooking. Ceramic coating is the way to go! Did I mention it is oven safe?
customer_reviews.author: gedamengmeng

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set less than 2 months ago. I already threw away the smaller pan. Today I tried to make rice, I used avocado oil, and low heat, that picture is the result. I never had any item in the dishwasher, and I always cooked in low and medium heat. Couldn’t make eggs or anything else. The set is pretty and I read the reviews and I shouldn’t have bought them. Do not buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Leoncio Junior

customer_reviews.title: Rims are chipped. Utensils defective.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots and pans. Especially the color. The only issue I have is the Rims seem damaged. The silver rims have like chips in them. Also the utensils are crappy. Once they get hot all this what looks like hot glue comes out of the handle. It melts and seeps out. I wouldn’t waste my money on these again. Walmart sets a better set by Green life for a fraction of the price. I wish I got them off Walmart’s website.
customer_reviews.author: amber romaine

customer_reviews.title: I love love love my pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my pots and pans. They work great and are easy to clean. My biggest problem is that the company does not sell replacement covers. I was putting away a cover and I accidently dropped it on the floor. It completely shattered. I haven’t had other brands break on me, but assuming I am not the only one who has has a greenlife cover break, i thought they would sell replacement pieces. If you buy this set, be very very careful you dont drop the covers.
customer_reviews.author: PDXRunner

customer_reviews.title: Good value for two person household
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give these pans 5 stars because they are the best pans ever; I gave 5 stars because given the relatively low price they are excellent. I probably will not have them in three years and that, again, for the price, make them an excellent value. Great if cooking for two people, these are not very big. That said, pay attention to how they are used, If you need to cook something on the stove top that requires high heat, use another pan. Don't use canned spray oil. Do not ever put metal utensils anywhere near the pan; ust like almost all cad pots and pans, they chip/scratch easily. No Dishwasher, no need, they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit the Reader

customer_reviews.title: Frying pan and pots
customer_reviews.text: After one use it appears that the layer has cracked
customer_reviews.author: Sladjana Ljuboja

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and work well, BUT
customer_reviews.text: The recommended cooking temperature makes bringing anything to a boil take FOREVER!!!! I'm glad I didn't get rid of all of my old stainless steel pots before trying these. It takes about 3 times as long to bring 6 eggs plus water to cover to a boil in these pans as in my stainless pot. The same for cooking oatmeal or soup mixes. I love, love, love them for frying and for slow cooking of homemade soups and stews, just will not be trying anything else in a pot that needs to boil.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, had this product for less than a month and two of the pans have melted plastic. I’m going to return this set, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mei-Zhen

customer_reviews.title: Handles Burn And Turn Black Regardless Of Heat Setting! Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are terrible! I was so excited when I first received them-the color is beautiful! Then I started to use them. The soft grip handles burn each time I use them regardless of heat setting or what steps I take to try to avoid the handle getting heated. They turn black where the handle connects to the body and give off a horrible burning smell that permeates the kitchen. So much for the pretty look. My brand new pots and pans all have burned, blackened handles. Even though these pans are very reasonably priced, it’s still a waste of money. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR WASTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! These are God awful! They scratch crazy easy. They do not clean well. They stain and get black specks everywhere. I used my pan ONCE on low heat and now theres stains and black spots. All I did was heat up some chicken. Didnt even cook it. Just used it to heat it up! The plastic utensils melted during first use as well. These are the worst I've ever seen or used. Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Salas

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love using green life products. I originally had the teal color set for years but they were worn down so I decided to get these light pink ones and I'm so happy I did. I absolutely love their color. I even purchased the rack holder from Amazon as well to keep them in place in my cabinet rather then just all tossed on top of each other. They are easy to clean. Be sure to use only low to medium heat cause they do cook the food fast. It says no sprays but I have used them but I dont use much and i wash it right away. I'm very happy with this purchase. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased them
customer_reviews.text: This set is really nice for the price however if you fail to use enough oil when cooking or get the pans too hot you will leave them stained. They cook evenly and are very easy to clean up when used correctly, if not, they can be a nightmare. The frying pans are a bit small but for daily uses, eggs, etc they are perfect. The looks of this set are appealing and the handles are great, no burnt fingers. Overall for the price the quality is above what I expected and I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: BJMC

customer_reviews.title: Don't use cooking spray on these
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read instructions before using. I do like the color of the pans but in order to use these you must use butter in them no sprays. I was always a spray pam girl but you can't with these because they will build up a residue on them. I saw this so no problem but wish I could use cooking spray. Not the end of the world. Now if I could just get house guests to stop using metal on the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Love these pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: I won’t be using the utensils but the pots are wonderful and the non stick technology is why I purchased in the first place. They cannot be cleaned in dishwasher, however they are easy to clean once used. I’d recommend this to anyone looking for a set.
customer_reviews.author: CollsCloset

customer_reviews.title: I liked the skimmer cooking tool but all of them were ...
customer_reviews.text: The pots were okay but the pans were definitely not "non-stick". As others mentioned, it wore off after about 2 months and then everything I cooked was sticking to the pan. I did see scratches on the pans but all cooking utensils I used were plastic. The bottom had burn marks that couldn't be scrubbed off after about a month or two of useage. I liked the skimmer cooking tool but all of them were made of bad plastic and was melting away already by the 3rd month. I returned them and got Circulon ones.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, do it!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new set! I was very skeptical about getting it since there were so many reviews, but I decided to give it a try and I could not have made a better decision! I have been using them for little over a month now, and I have cooked nothing but great meals! The secret is, follow the guidelines that come with it! Max of medium heat, silicone utensils only, hand washing only ( yellow part of the sponge), and you will have a great long lasting product! I have used it every day and there is not one scratch or stain on it!
customer_reviews.author: Letícia Terra

customer_reviews.title: This product should be pulled from the Shelf. Dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible dangerous garbage. Pull this product. Had I kept the Box these would have already been returned. I read the reviews after ordering and I figured maybe it was user error causing the handles to melt maybe putting heat to close excetera but it's not the case these are highly dangerous and a waste of money. The edges of the pans where the metal is didn't tarnish they literally peeled. The surface of these is very thin and shows scratch marks even when using plastic utensils to cook with. These are not even a good starter set because of the dangers of them melting at the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kuba

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE PANS!
customer_reviews.text: I really do not write reviews, but I need to tell people DO NOT BUY THESE PANS. I have cooked for 30 years and I can't imagine worse pans. They clean horribly, the rubber handle of the pan, or the pan itself (it was difficult to tell which) gives off a horrible chemical smell that I have to open all of the windows to clear out. The pans scratch and scald incredibly easily. They were such a waste of money and am hoping to get our money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality in my opinion:(
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this cookware. However, I bought my set 3 months ago and the white is already chipping off. I don't see it on Amazon but on some retail sites they say it is suppose to be metal utensil safe but it is not. I've only hand washed my set and even the sponge is making it chip even though it's a soft sponge like it says to use. I'm really disappointed because ideas really looking forward to using this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Can't clean them
customer_reviews.text: Thus is the result after three months of use. That's the cleanest I can get this pan. I've used the most abrasive scrubber short of BBQ cleaning tools. Other than that, they perform like ordinary pans.
customer_reviews.author: Majorlagg

customer_reviews.title: It doesn`t give off any chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because the finish doesn`t have any of the chemicals that plain non-stick release, when I`m cooking, also its the best non stick there is. I`m glad I bought it. The thing to remember is When you buy these kind of items thru Amazon just send it back if you dont like it, Amazon will give you a shipping label to return it. Max
customer_reviews.author: max steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pot and pan set for about a month now and am extremely happy with it. It is truly non-stick, I'm able to wipe out or clean messes easily. The handles do not heat up like my old pots and pans, so you do not need to use potholders. My only complaint is about the bonus little egg pan. It doesn't seem as non-stick as the rest of the set, and the egg yolk that dripped on the outside of the pan burned on and turned the turquoise black. Other than that small issue I very much enjoy cooking with the cheery pot and pan set.
customer_reviews.author: djohn900

customer_reviews.title: So cute and LOVE dishwasher-safe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive cookware. I'm not a big cook so I can't really speak to the quality - I use one pot and one pan throughout the week. I just love that it's dishwasher safe and food comes off so easily. It's a very pretty blue. Only thing I'll say is if you use the dishwasher it does seem to come out a little stained, washing by hand is more thorough and preserves the beautiful color. I don't think there is any company that has figured that out though so that is not a knock against this brand. Overall, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: loved this set! they’re so pretty and they work great! i highly recommend 😍💙 i got the blue
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great if you have a little girl with a play kitchen. Everything is much smaller than appears in the pictures and is barely usable. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: truly nonstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of cookware! I got it in turquoise, the color is true to the photos. Had them for about a month now and I use them every day, pots and pans are very durable, and truly nonstick. The ceramic surface is super easy to clean, no scrubbing at all. The only minor complaint is that the outside of the pan can get stained, especially for the light blue color. I got some grease on the outside of the pan, as you normally would during cooking, and the heat immediately created a brown stain that's really hard to remove, I'm afraid of damaging the paint if I scrubbed any harder.
customer_reviews.author: Claudzee

customer_reviews.title: Best Pans Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best pans I have ever purchased Easy clean up I only use Silicone cooking utensils in them and when Storing them I put wash cloths in between them to protect them from touching Bottom of the pans have NOT discolored from heat of my electric glass top stove. So far the White ceramic inside is still white and looks almost as good as new. I was afraid after several uses and washing them in the dishwasher they would start to yellow. So far so good I will know for sure in a year.
customer_reviews.author: World Wide Lite

customer_reviews.title: Blue to black
customer_reviews.text: I am the kind of person who takes care of my things. I read the instructions and made a good point to follow them. The very first time I used a pan, it burned a mark into it. I was using water and spinach on low heat, it burned. Well. 14 months into owning this set. Theyre all pretty much black as my friend who had the set said they would be. I thought maybe she cooked on high. Or used oil. Nope, these are just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Hensler

customer_reviews.title: Not ceramic
customer_reviews.text: Clearly the material is some kind of metal by how it clangs together - not ceramic. I can’t speak to the quality of it, but disappointed at the false advertising, and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean and cook with, great color
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this color. Cooking is easy, but also they're so easy to clean it makes me not dread the dishes! I use the bigger pot and frying pan the most because I generally make dinner+lunch for the next day. I can tell these will last a long time and I'm so glad I bought them. For the accoutrements- I don't exactly understand how the strainer is supposed to work, since it doesn't fit the bigger pot? I'm really happy these came with matching utensils. But in truth I would probably give this a 4.5 because the utensils are flimsy and I am surprised none have broken yet. All in all, get this set!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Green Life Pots & Pans Review
customer_reviews.text: Overjoyed with these. I love the color and love they are ceramic. Very good brand and economy friendly. These don’t have the toxins that most nonstick pots & pans have especially when used at high heat. This company only uses green products, such as nontoxic natural nonstick ceramic. Not only are they stylish and pretty they are safe and healthy to use! We got 16 piece set and it came with steamer basket and cooking utensils. Have already highly recommended on my social media and follow the company!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Perrine

customer_reviews.title: Durable and performs well
customer_reviews.text: I think these are very good quality. Now these are not the best non stick pans out there but do the job in my opinion. Pretty easy to clean except if your cooking eggs. Might want to use another brand pan for that but everything else from soup to spaghetti this set had no problem in performing. As with all painted pots one must exercise some caution in clanging them together and use provided plastic utensils to avoid scratching the surface. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these pots and pans. I love them so much! <3 They're great quality and easy to clean, but they CANNOT be put in the dishwasher. They are easy to hand wash and will last a lot longer if hand-washed only and shouldn't be scraped when cleaning or have metal utensils used on them. They heat up so quickly and last a long time. I also love that they come with cleaning instructions too. ANd the color! <3
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Pans burn and become non stick
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this mid-June. Let me preface this, I do not cook. All I use the frying pans for are to make eggs and bacon, that’s all. Both pans have burned and changed color and now the eggs just stick. It’s been six months! I travel a ton for work so they’re really only used a couple times per month. Super sad because they look gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Morales Jr,

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved these pans when I first got them, but they are essentially useless now. Everything sticks - you can't cook on them! I have always hand-washed them, never used spray cook oil, cooked things at a lower temperature...the price is outrageous considering that I can't use them anymore. I love the color - that's basically the whole reason I got them - but it obviously wasn't worth it. I've also contacted the manufacturer and seller several times and no one will respond. I highly advise not buying these.
customer_reviews.author: celticmommie

customer_reviews.title: Best pans ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!! I love non stick pans but hated having to worry about hand washing them since I have physical limitations that make it difficult for me. But these are amazing! They are dishwasher safe and cook all kinds of foods perfectly!! I waited several weeks before reviewing to make sure they held up well. And so far they have held up beautifully! They look everything from pasta, to gravy, to veggies, to meats perfectly! I couldn’t be happier! I highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nace

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick coating doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The non-stick coating has started to come off after only a few months of use and food constantly sticks / burns. We've been very careful to never use metal utensils on them, not subject them to intense heat while cooking, and hand wash only. We would even put a slight coating of olive oil on them after use. Bought my sister-in-law a set and she's had the same issue. Would have expected better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: sjm23

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try the Greenlife pans because it says it won’t give off any harsh smells or odor but it does when it’s on high heat. The handles also burned a little so I won’t be buying this brand again or I don’t think I can recommend them either. But other then that these pans are just okay. Haven’t had any sticking yet but then again I haven’t had then long just been a couple of weeks so far. Only time will tell right .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots and pans. They are so cute and I thought they were super easy to clean over time. I only hand wash them and don’t put them in the dishwasher. I’ve had them for a few months now and one of my pans is not in great condition. I have tried to clean it but the marks will not come off. I’m not sure if I didn’t something wrong, but I’m really bummed that this is happening because it makes it not look nice!
customer_reviews.author: mom of 5 girls

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pans fail fast
customer_reviews.text: Loved pans, for 11 months. Babied them, hand washing, no metal utensils, low heat, no kids allowed to use. Then, at month 12, something went terribly wrong. I don't know if it was from stacking them in a drawer or accidentally using high heat or maybe these pans just have a one-year life cycle but all 3 pans began to stain and I could not get the stains out. It advanced to food sticking where you end up with more food stuck in the pan then actually coming out of the pan. I didn't bother trying to get a refund. I've gotten a year out of them so I'm going to call it even.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles burn and chips easily
customer_reviews.text: SAVE YOUR MONEY! Originally loved this set. However after a few times using there was a horrific chemical smell. After looking we seen that the handles on the pans were burning..no matter how low the flame was on the stove. It is a definite design flaw. I only hand wash the pans with no abrasives and only use silicone cookware.Its already chipping. I would not buy these again. Contacted the company and they said its not covered under warranty. Not even the chipping already happening let alone the burning.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely set. The pink color is uniform and it looks exactly like the picture. So often things aren’t as they appear online but in this instance, they are one in the same. In fact, I think this set is actually a bit prettier in person than it seems online. They’re also nice, heavy, quality cookware. I’m more than happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zurcher

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic finish is thin and product has a cheap feel. Heat is not distributed evenly and need more grease to avoid burning food on a pot that advertises as "green." Wouldn't recommend purchasing these overpriced cheaply made pots.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and better for your health
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about these is that you can’t cook anything on high heat so as not to leave burn marks on the bottom. It adds some time to cooking, especially when you need to boil liquids. But this is an acceptable trade off for me, using something that is healthier and more environmentally safe. (As for the other reviewers who have said it still gets burn marks on the bottom even when cooking on medium heat, that has not been my experience at all. Mine are in pristine condition.)
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans are great for the light cooking I do. I am not a gourmet chef, lets tell the truth, neither are you, so why spend hundreds and hundreds buying pans for warming soup and cooking grilled cheese? These pans are great for the regular cook and they clean up so easy and look amazing. Nothing sticks and you can cook without a lot of added oils. The lids fit tight and the handles make it easy to grab a hot pan of boiling pasta to drain it without burning your hands. Easy peasy... Great buy and really like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: KarenWasHere

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, excellent nonstick capabilities, easy to clean. Works well on my gas stove, no problems with handles breaking or melting like some people seem to have experienced. Just follow the rules for cooking/cleaning nonstick and you'll be good. I replaced my several year old greenlife set which was still in great condition because I wanted a new color to match my kitchen redesign. I trust the brand. The only thing is the color was not as warm a shade of pink as I expected, it was a little more on the cool side. Not an really an issue for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of this brand, but for the price, you can't beat it! Product arrived early, which was surprising! Box was in excellent condition, & the way item was packed was very secure. I love the color! The only issues I have with the set is that the omelette pan has a black handle & doesn't match the set, you can't actually get temperature high enough to boil items because instructions call for "medium heat best" (pasta, for instance), & I wish the handles on the utensils was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: They are not life changing or anything but I really like them. I haven't had any problems. If you follow manufacturer guidelines I think it's fine. They are super cute, meaning they bring a little something extra to your kitchen. I am enjoying the pink! DO NOT PAY MORE THAN $85 for a set. I've seen the price of the pink set go as high as $213, while all other colors stayed the same $85 or less price. Anything more than $85 is too much for this set.
customer_reviews.author: MauiMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set is of really great quality. The pans and pots are non-stick and have a very good heat distribution when cooking any food. They fact that they are non-stick makes them extremely easy to clean. I would recommend this cookware set to anyone looking for good quality for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: rawan elashkar

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooking set! I had hand me down 20+ year old pots and pans and wanted something new. I got the pink set and they are so pretty. I think my eggs cook up fluffier. You don't need much oil because the surface is kind of slick. The tools have been useful as well. I'm very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick wears off within months
customer_reviews.text: It started off great and nice, but a few months later I have to over oil the pan so the food doesn’t stick and burn to the pan. I was very careful and used plastic and soft utensils so it wouldn’t scratch the surface so badly. I’ve had ikea pans for way longer than these and they’re still nonstick. Unfortunately I wouldn’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: This set is for a beginner. An amateur who boils water and scrambles eggs. I would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: This cookware was recommended by my daughter for high quality and environmentally friendly. It works fine as long as you don’t cook at above medium heat. I seared fish and the pan is ruined. And it wasn’t high heat. It was medium high. I’m past the return window by a week. I wish I could send this set back, but lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Bother!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these a year and a half and they’re horrid. I wasn’t going to write a review, but after seeing it wasn’t just mine.. I thought I should. Low heat, burns. Everything sticks inside and the bottom always burns. No sense in posting pictures because all of the ones posted are a true representation of this product. Aaaand the size of the pots is awful. A tiny one, ok I’ll bug. We can cook a can of veggies. A large pot for things like spaghetti, ok I’ll buy. But the middle size is ridiculous. You cannot even cook a normal box of macaroni. Jeeeezus! Just don’t even bother with these!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best non-stick pots and pans.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these over two years ago for the "healthy" alternative to Teflon non-stick surface pots/pans. The went great with my teal themed kitchen wear, and they feel very sturdy and cook evenly. My issue with them is that after only about half a year, following cleaning instructions given by the manufacturer, they can no longer be considered "non-stick". I even only used silicon spatulas, spoons, and whisks. I purchased a T-fal set instead and haven't looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Borsalino A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking set, but beware of soft grip charring
customer_reviews.text: Needed new pots for my move. Chose this collection due to color and price. Extremely affordable and nice looking. After the first use I did notice the grips on my larger skillet pan had burned and charred. I didn't have my gas range set at a high temperature setting either. It was set on level 3. Highly recommend you watch your pots and pans during the cooking process. Other than this the pots and pans do the job as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are fantastic. When used properly, food will not stick and clean up is so very simple. Many folks make the mistake of cooking everything at high temp which is not good for the recipe and certainly not for most non-stick pans. Don't use metal utensils. I have also found hand washing better for life span than the dishwasher. Since nothing sticks anyway, hand washing is fast and not a big deal. The pans are not as heavy as I thought they would be, but perform great.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans for the money!
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to clean, no need to really use any sort of oil, seems to hold heat well. For the cost, they are really great to cook with as long as you use only the utensils that comes with them. Metal scratches it immediately and you need to take care not to stack them in each other. Once we figured this out though it’s been great. They are actually my favorite skillets now...you could just wipe them out with a paper towel if you wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Princess of Picky

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two different sets of these I like them so much. My first set though got messed up with cooking spray. Do NOT use it on these. It creates a weird residue on the pans that is very difficult to get off. Use olive oil or another liquid oil and there is no issue. So the only issue I have with these was a user error.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyc + HaileyJ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. Be careful to cook in low or medium because it stains easily. The non stick coat works very well. I use olive oil or coconut oil to cook. The pans are light weight. I haven’t test it in the oven yet. The utensils included are delicate you can not press the bread without bend the handle. I am happy with this set because the pots have a good quality and a good buy for the price in a lovely color. I have being using this set of pans just for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JnF

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE these pans!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best pots and pans I have ever owned. I was skeptical about buying pans like this because I have in the past and things stuck to them like crazy. These don't have an issue with sticking at all! You need to be sure to hand wash them and DO NOT use any type of metal on them or they will start to stick and wear out faster. As long as you take care of them and do those couple of things these will last you a long time. I love the mint blue as well! Such a pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Melton

customer_reviews.title: BURNED THE HANDLE FROM MY GAS STOVE
customer_reviews.text: They look nice and food cooks on it well. But within the first time using them It would burn the bottom of the handle. Then it would put out this horrible smell in my kitchen that was difficult to get rid of. I have a gas stove, so maybe it might work better for an electric stove, but I had a bad experience. I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware
customer_reviews.text: OMG i have cooked with this since college and 10 years later still the best cookware and very unexpensive, i have tryed several brands and materials but its hands down the best, as a warning do not use nonstick spray because it will ruin the pan and do not crack your stove to high (it doesnt need it) just leave it on medium.
customer_reviews.author: edward rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set for the price. Unfortunately, the medium sized fry pan did not hold up. I ended up tossing it, but I think a family member used it while staying at our house and didn’t treat it right. I read reviews saying that you shouldn’t use these pans on high heat so I’ve avoided doing that. Other than the one pan, they’re holding up extremely well. They’re very easy to clean and lightweight which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: You get about if years worth of use:
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this set for a year now and will have to replace at least once piece if not two. Although I use them and clean them as instructed the larger fry pan started showing signs of wear (sticking, chipping..) after nine months, one of the smaller fry pans started showing wear at 11 months. Both the sauce pots are still fine, minus some minor chipping on the rims. Overall a decent set, just wished they would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Not same quality you buy in the store.
customer_reviews.text: ***Update: Though, as stated before, what I received was not as high quality as what I bought in the store, it functions well on my ceramic top stove. I reduce heat slightly due to the thinner bottom. Raising my rating from 3 to 4.***** I was because what I bought in the store was much better quality...and I bought it at Walmart. Not a bad set for the price paid ($45) but not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Missed a chip in the ceramic when I got the set
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while, but just used the large pot for the first time. I noticed that the ceramic is chipped off the inside of the pan where the handle is attached on the outside- there's a sent there like it was tightened too much. Kind of disappointed, as this will likely be a starting point for more of the ceramic to chip.
customer_reviews.author: venessa lee

customer_reviews.title: Coating chips if you look at it wrong
customer_reviews.text: First off, these are a nice set when it comes to actually cooking food. However, on one of our first uses, the non-stick coating had a big ol' chip come off it. We read the directions and made sure that we didn't use anything above medium heat on the stove and hand washed the pan after letting it cool but never the less, we now have an unusable pan. Worse yet, the pans took so long to arrive after ordering them on Prime Day that the return window closed leaving us with a useless pan for our troubles. Buy with caution!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good, but delicate
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set since March, so just over 6 months. I love how they cook and clean, but they are VERY delicate. I am a patient cook and not rough. My husband is the opposite. He is rough and has damaged them with each use. Not enough to the point that they are unusable, but my last set of cookware lasted me almost 20 years, no way this will hold up the same with him. (granted, to replace my current set with the same brand would have cost me 10x as much). They are great for empty nesters who do light cooking.
customer_reviews.author: GIP

product_meta.title: GreenLife Soft Grip 16pc Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set, Turquoise - CC001007-001
product_meta.description: Color:Turquoise| Size:16-Piece| Style Name:Cookware SetThe GreenLife soft grip 16pc ceramic non-stick cookware set, Turquoise makes the perfect addition to any kitchen. The high performance Thermolon ceramic non-stick coating is long lasting and easy to clean, made without pfas, PFOA, lead or cadmium. The aluminum reinforced body adds a touch of style to your kitchen, while the matching soft-grip handles provide much-needed Comfort. The glass lids allow for convenient monitoring while cooking and the dishwasher-safe construction makes cleanup a breeze. This set includes: 4" mini frypan, 7" open frypan, 9.5" open frypan, 1Qt covered saucepan, 2Qt covered saucepan, 5Qt covered stockpot, 2.5Qt covered saute pan, 7" stainless steel steamer, and 4 kitchen utensils.
feature_bullets: FREE YOUR HEALTHY CHEF — Our cookware is made of Thermolon ceramic non-stick, manufactured free of PFOA, PFAS, lead or cadmium. Even if you accidentally overheat your pan, toxic fumes will not release.

SET INCLUDES — 4” mini frypan, 7” open frypan, 9.5” open frypan, 1QT covered saucepan, 2QT covered saucepan, 5QT covered stockpot, 2.5QT covered sauté pan, 7” stainless steel steamer and 4 kitchen utensils.
OVEN SAFE ERGONOMIC STAY COOL SOFT GRIP HANDLE — Soft to touch, maximum in comfort and oven safe up to 350F.
STURDY ALUMINUM REINFORCED BODY — creating an excellent heat conductor for all your recipes allowing you to use less energy whilst cooking. Trust us, you can do it too.
DISHWASHER SAFE — No more fighting over the dishes.Handle Material: Bakelite
USE AND CARE — for best results, we recommend cooking on low to medium heat settings with butter or high smoke point oils using nylon or wooden utensils.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,923 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
